NOVEMBER 2015 | BTF BIRMINGHAM OPEN
CONGRATULATIONS TO WALESTKD STUDENTS WHO COMPETED AT THE TOURNAMENT
Congratulations to Walestkd'ers who competed at the BTF Birmingham Open. Congratulations to WALESTKD (Llanharry) Students:

  • Marcus Docherty Gold Patterns
  • Harri Docherty Bronze Patterns
  • Kiera James Silver Sparring
  • Nathan Eratne Gold Special Technique

Well done to all of the other students who also competed today, great atmosphere great sportsmanship = Great Taekwon-Do

DECEMBER 2015 | BLACK BELT PROMOTION
CONGRATULATIONS TO ETHAN BARNS ON HIS PROMOTION TO 1ST DEGREE
All of WalesTKD would like to congratulate young Mr Barnes on his promotion to I Degree Black Belt. He has worked so hard over the past 6 months and today all the hard work paid off, his technical ability, knowledge and effort did not go unnoticed by the grading examiner Master David Dykes VII.

Mr Barnes has been training with the school for almost 5yrs and when asked why he wanted to be a Black Belt he wrote that he wanted to make his parents proud of him, well today Mr Barnes you did just that, and you should also be very proud of your achievement as we Instructors are so proud of you. Keep the hard work as you have a great future In Taekwon-Do.

MERTHYR TYDFIL | FEBRUARY 2016 | ADULTS & JUNIORS WELCOME
TAEKWON-DO MERTHYR TYDFIL are hosting a new beginners class for all ages.

Class Times are as follows:
Monday 5pm to 6pm
Thursday 5pm to 6pm

Location:
Merthyr Leisure Trust Village, Merthyr Tydfil, CF48 1UT

Note ******

All insturtors are BTC (British Taekwon-do Council) registered & DBS checked. We also hold full Indemnity Insurance & First Aid for Sports Certified.

GRADING | FEBRUARY 2016
CONGRATS TO WALESTKD STUDENTS WHO WERE PROMOTED BY MASTER DYKES 7TH DEGREE
Another proud day for the students of WalesTKD Congratulations to all of our students who successfully passed their grading, once again the standard and Improvement from all students was excellent with some very positive comments from Master David Dykes who again we would like to thank for his continued support and guidance. Master Dykes also presented Ethan Barnes with his first Black Belt Certificate, one of many I'm sure, and not forgetting the students who completed their pre-assessments for Black Belt grading in April. Well done to everyone, keep up the hard work and lets all enjoy the Battle of the Bridge on the 27th.

COMPETITION | FEBRUARY 2016
SUCCESS FOR WALES TKD (Llanharry) AT THE BATTLE OF THE BRIDGE 2016
What another fantastic day at the Battle of the Bridge for the students of WalesTKD. There were over 175 competitors at this years event organised by Mr Peter Kent-Marrast (Taekwon-Do Wales) and what a superb atmosphere. The Day Started at 9.30am with team patterns and then moved onto Individual patterns, standards were very high from all schools and there were some very tough decisions choosing the winners of each round. We then moved on to the sparring category, again standards were high and it was great to see such sportsmanship from all students. Team wales medal count for the at.
Click here to visit walestkd.co.uk
Team Patterns:

Bronze Dragon Warriors. Caitlin Lamont, Maddie Thoma, Kiera James and Ben Huckridge

Individual Patterns:
-Gold: Harri Docherty
-Silver: Dan Huckridge
-Silver: Marcus: Docherty
-Sparring:

Black Belt Category
-Bronze: Ethan Barnes

Coloured Belt Category:
-Silver: Kiera James
-Silver: Harri Docherty
-Bronze: Aidan Mumford
-Bronze: Tia McGowan

Also well done to, Vannesa Sikorska, Leah Roberts, Nathan Ertatne
Our thanks goes to Mr Peter Kent-Marrast for organizing such a successful event, SM Wayne Brown, Master David Dykes and all the other officials/umpires who helped the day run smoothly. and of course not forgetting all the students from each school who made the day

GRADING | APRIL 2016
CONGRATS TO WALESTKD STUDENTS WHO WERE PROMOTED BY MASTER DYKES 7TH DEGREE
A huge congratulations to all those students that were successful in their promotion today, another very proud day for WalesTKD as we congratulate our latest Black Belts:

  • Mr Graham Beckwith promoted I Degree
  • Mr Hadley Brown promoted I Degree
Coloured belt promotions
  • Dan Huckridge Promoted 4th Kup
  • Alexandra Hughes Promoted 7th Kup
  • Ben Price promoted 8th Kup
  • Seren Morgan Promoted 8th Kup
  • Bruna Sgaria Cichoni Promoted 9th Kup

A big well done also to those students who completed their mid term assessments, standards were high with some very good comments from Master Dykes.
We also had an Excellent pre-training lesson and it was nice to see such a good turnout of black belts and coloured belts, once again thank you to Master Dykes for conducting the training and grading.
COMPETITION | JUNE 2016
UKTA | WELSH OPEN 2016
Another Success Campaign for the Wales TKD crew at the UKTA Welsh Open 2016. Congratulations to our medallists:

  • Mr. James Mannion (II Dan)
  • Mr. Graham Beckwith (I Dan)
  • Kiera James (Blue Tag)
  • Marcus Docherty (Blue Tag)
  • Who Docherty (Blue Tag)
  • Andy Price (Green Tag)
  • Ben Price (Yellow Belt)
